featured.text: The team has also developed a special device which uses scent bottles and visual trickery to make the wearers of these glasses think that the plain snack they are eating is 29 than it actually is.

definition.en_def: A distinctive smell, especially a pleasant one.
definition.example: The scent of fresh flowers filled the room.
